E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 9/7/1973
Subject: Progress of Tom Makowski
Dear Sir,
Tom Makowski has nothing more to prove at A Appleton Foxes!
He has an ERA of 2.78 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
